mapper.select: select a.*, b.file_name from user_info a left outer join file_info b on a.user_idx = b.post_idx and b.route_type = 'profile' where a.kakao_id = #{kakao_id}
mapper.update: update user_info set nick = #{nick} where user_idx = #{user_idx}
mapper.delete: update user_info set user_flag = 'N' where user_idx = #{user_idx}
